main.name: John Edgar Francisco
main.description: I am a web and app developer and I use some popular programming frameworks for my projects
main.bio: John Edgar is currently working as a Software Developer and is always interested in a challenging project.
main.contactmessage: If you have any questions, please feel free to drop me a line. If you don't get an answer immediately. I might just be travelling through the middle of nowhere. I'll get back to you as soon as I can. That's a promise!
